NAME: Display name for the element (shown in UI, used by g_isolated_print_box)
BOX_SIZE_XYZ: Box outer dimensions [width, depth, height] in mm. Note: inset-lid boxes are taller by 2× wall thickness.
BOX_FEATURE: Feature — defines one set of compartments inside the box
BOX_LID: Lid parameters — controls lid style, pattern, and labels
BOX_NO_LID_B: If checked, no lid is generated and no inset lip is formed
BOX_STACKABLE_B: If checked, box base is cut to stack on identical boxes (requires 45° overhang capability)
BOX_WALL_THICKNESS: Wall thickness in mm (overrides the global g_wall_thickness)
ENABLED_B: Uncheck to skip this item without deleting it
_DEBUG_B: Highlight this item's geometry in transparent red (OpenSCAD # modifier) for debugging
LABEL: Label block — add text or images to surfaces
ROTATION: Rotation in degrees around the Z axis
POSITION_XY: Position offset [x, y]. Use numbers for absolute mm, or CENTER / MAX for alignment.
FTR_COMPARTMENT_SIZE_XYZ: Interior size of each compartment [width, depth, height] in mm
FTR_NUM_COMPARTMENTS_XY: Grid layout [columns, rows] — how many compartments in each direction
FTR_SHAPE_ROTATED_B: Rotate the compartment shape 90° around the Z axis
FTR_SHAPE_VERTICAL_B: Orient shape for vertical piece stacks (extrude sideways instead of up)
FTR_PADDING_XY: Spacing between adjacent compartments [x, y] in mm
FTR_PADDING_HEIGHT_ADJUST_XY: Height adjustment for padding walls [x, y] — typically negative values
FTR_MARGIN_FBLR: Extra margin around the component [front, back, left, right] in mm
FTR_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B: Add finger cutouts on sides [front, back, left, right]
FTR_CUTOUT_CORNERS_4B: Add corner cutouts [front-left, back-right, back-left, front-right]
FTR_CUTOUT_HEIGHT_PCT: Cutout height as % of compartment height (from top). Default: 100
FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_PCT: Cutout depth as % of compartment depth (into base). Default: 25
FTR_CUTOUT_WIDTH_PCT: Cutout width as % of compartment width. Default: 50
FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_B: Add a bottom cutout for pushing pieces out from below
FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_PCT: Bottom cutout size as % of compartment. Default: 80
FTR_CUTOUT_TYPE: Where cutouts are applied: INTERIOR only, EXTERIOR only, or BOTH
FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_MAX: Maximum cutout depth in mm (0 = no limit)
FTR_SHEAR: Shear angle [x, y] in degrees — pivots around compartment center
FTR_FILLET_RADIUS: Fillet radius in mm (only for FILLET shape, capped at compartment height)
FTR_PEDESTAL_BASE_B: Add a pedestal push-out base — ideal for tiles/cards in interior compartments
LID_FIT_UNDER_B: Cap-style lid that fits over the box (uncheck for flush lid)
LID_SOLID_B: Solid lid with no pattern cutouts — labels are recessed into the surface
LID_HEIGHT: Lid height in mm. Default: 4mm for cap lids, 2mm for inset lids
LID_INSET_B: Inset lid that sits inside the box walls (required for stackable boxes)
LID_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B: Finger cutouts in the lid [front, back, left, right] — makes lid usable as a tray
LID_TABS_4B: Retention tabs on inset lids [front, back, left, right]
LID_LABELS_INVERT_B: Raised label text (embossed) instead of recessed (engraved)
LID_SOLID_LABELS_DEPTH: Label depth on solid lids in mm
LID_LABELS_BG_THICKNESS: Label background panel thickness in mm
LID_LABELS_BORDER_THICKNESS: Label border line thickness in mm
LID_STRIPE_WIDTH: Width of stripe lines in the label background pattern
LID_STRIPE_SPACE: Spacing between stripe lines in the label background pattern
LID_PATTERN_RADIUS: Radius of each pattern element (hex, circle, etc.) in the lid mesh
LID_PATTERN_N1: Number of sides for the outer pattern shape
LID_PATTERN_N2: Number of sides for the inner pattern shape
LID_PATTERN_ANGLE: Rotation angle of the pattern shapes in degrees
LID_PATTERN_ROW_OFFSET: Row offset as % — how much each row shifts horizontally
LID_PATTERN_COL_OFFSET: Column offset as % — how much each column shifts vertically
LID_PATTERN_THICKNESS: Wall thickness of pattern shapes in mm
LBL_TEXT: Label text. Use a string for all compartments, or a 2D array for per-compartment labels.
LBL_IMAGE: Path to SVG image file (Warning: slows rendering considerably)
LBL_SIZE: Font size as a number, or AUTO to fit the available space
LBL_PLACEMENT: Where to place the label: surface edges, walls, center (floor), or bottom of box
LBL_FONT: OpenSCAD font specifier, e.g. "Times New Roman:style=Bold Italic"
LBL_DEPTH: How deep the label cuts or embosses in mm
LBL_AUTO_SCALE_FACTOR: Scale multiplier when using AUTO size (larger = bigger text)
DIV_TAB_CYCLE: Number of tab positions before the tab cycles back to the left
DIV_TAB_CYCLE_START: Starting position in the tab cycle (1-based)
DIV_TAB_TEXT: Array of strings — one per divider tab
DIV_TAB_TEXT_CHAR_THRESHOLD: Auto-shrink text when it exceeds this many characters
DIV_FRAME_SIZE_XY: Divider frame dimensions [width, height] in mm (without tab)
DIV_FRAME_TOP: Frame top border height in mm
DIV_FRAME_BOTTOM: Frame bottom border height in mm
DIV_FRAME_COLUMN: Frame vertical column divider width in mm
DIV_FRAME_NUM_COLUMNS: Number of vertical columns in frame (-1 = solid, 0 = no columns)
g_print_lid_b: Print lids (uncheck to render boxes only)
g_print_box_b: Print boxes (uncheck to render lids only)
g_isolated_print_box: Render only this named box (leave empty for all boxes)
g_wall_thickness: Default wall thickness in mm (can be overridden per-box)
g_tolerance: Tolerance gap between fitting pieces (lid clearance) in mm
g_visualization_b: Show boxes in assembled arrangement (preview mode)
g_validate_keys_b: Warn about unknown or malformed keys in data
